title: 1946 : my first year nursing
creator_credit: Jean Cussen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When Jean Cussen’s father returned from the war, she took up nursing at the Children’s Hospital in Carlton. She provides, in rich detail, her time there, the children she cared for and how caring for these poor children brought the staff so much pleasure.
creator_credit_for_label: Jean Cussen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
